price: Asnjë popull nuk mund as ta shpejtojë, as ta ngadalësojë afatin (e shkatërrimit të vet).
arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
